sentences.english: A high performance liquid chromatography(HPLC) method had been developed to determine halofuginone in sturgeon muscle.
sentences.chinese: 建立了檢測鱘魚肌肉中常山酮殘留的高效液相色譜法。

sentences.english: One particular species of sturgeon swimming in these waters is the albino.
sentences.chinese: 在這些水域的鱘魚游泳物種的一個特別是白化。

sentences.english: Why the sturgeons jump has been the topic of a long-standing debate.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼鱘魚要跳躍歷來存在爭論。

sentences.english: Itnever did, and there are no Alabama sturgeons in captivity.
sentences.chinese: 但人們的希望落空了，阿拉巴馬鱘魚再也沒有出現過。

sentences.english: The baiji dolphin, the ancient river sturgeon and the finless porpoise depend on the Yangtze fortheir survival.
sentences.chinese: 白鰭豚，古老的鱘魚和江豚都生活在長江中。

sentences.english: The Caspian holds a great amount of sturgeon, which yield eggs that are processed into caviar.
sentences.chinese: 裏海生產大量的鱘魚，這些鱘魚可以加工成魚子醬。

sentences.english: The Caspian holds a great amount of sturgeon, which yield eggs that are processed into caviar.
sentences.chinese: 裏海生產大量的鱘魚，這些鱘魚可以加工成魚子醬。

sentences.english: The Sturgeon River rushes through a 300-foot (91-meter) gorge.
sentences.chinese: 鱘魚河在一段長達300英尺的峽谷中流過。

sentences.english: The cell bodies of the photoreceptors in retina of carp were also stained by zinc.
sentences.chinese: 鱘魚視網膜的部分光感受器胞體鋅離子染色陽性。

sentences.english: The August full moon is often called the Sturgeon Moon in North America.
sentences.chinese: 在北美八月滿月常被稱爲鱘魚之月。

sentences.english: Sturgeons are prized for their blackish roe.
sentences.chinese: 鱘魚因其黑色的魚卵而受到珍視。

definition: reptiles/also written 爬行類|爬行类
Cantonese poached chicken, known as "white cut chicken"
